Text: if this iso is worth the download, please let me and the community know.  this is my first trnt, so i'd be interested in knowing how the community prefers i offer trnts - isos or multiple files.   i know what i like, but what does the community prefer

I prefer ISO format = dos not have to unpack = if i have to unpack it takes double the diskstorage, the downside is if there is an error on the download on my side i might have to download the whole iso again (if it is several rar files i can re-download only the files that is corrupt. You should also offer a IMDB link like this : http://imdb.com/title/tt0106308/

eXELENT :-)

Love this movie, many years since I last saw it :-)
